sqlMap.select: SELECT CSCODE as csCode, STOREHOUSECODE as storehouseCode, csDate as csDate, csApprove as csApprove, csApproveMessage as csApproveMessage, csApproveState as csApproveState, csCheckPerson as csCheckPerson, csOptionor as csOptionor, CSSTATE as csState, CSSTARTSTOCK as csStartStock FROM CHECKSTOCK
